verses.verse: For Zion's sake <WH4616> I will not keep <WH2814> silent, <WH2814> And for Jerusalem's sake <WH4616> I will not keep <WH8252> quiet, <WH8252> Until <WH5704> her righteousness <WH6664> goes <WH3318> forth <WH3318> like brightness, <WH5051> And her salvation <WH3444> like a torch <WH3940> that is burning. <WH1197>

And the nations <WH1471> will see <WH7200> your righteousness, <WH6664> And all <WH3605> kings <WH4428> your glory; <WH9202> And you will be called <WH7121> by a new <WH2319> name, <WH8034> Which <WH834> the mouth <WH6310> of the Lord <WH3068> will designate. <WH9344>
You will also be a crown <WH5850> of beauty <WH8597> in the hand <WH3027> of the Lord, <WH3068> And a royal <WH4410> diadem <WH6797> in the hand <WH3709> of your God. <WH430>

It will no <WH3808> longer <WH5750> be said <WH559> to you, "Forsaken, <WH5800>" Nor <WH3808> to your land <WH776> will it any <WH5750> longer <WH5750> be said, <WH559> "Desolate <WH8077>"; But you will be called, <WH7121> "My delight <WH2656> is in her," And your land, <WH776> "Married <WH1166>"; For the Lord <WH3068> delights <WH2654> in you, And [to Him] your land <WH776> will be married. <WH1166>

For [as] a young <WH970> man <WH970> marries <WH1166> a virgin, <WH1330> [So] your sons <WH1121> will marry <WH1166> you; And [as] the bridegroom <WH2860> rejoices <WH4885> over <WH5921> the bride, <WH3618> [So] your God <WH430> will rejoice <WH7797> over <WH5921> you.

On your walls, <WH2346> O Jerusalem, <WH3389> I have appointed <WH6485> watchmen; <WH8104> All <WH3605> day <WH3117> and all <WH3605> night <WH3915> they will never <WH3808> keep <WH2814> silent. <WH2814> You who remind <WH2142> the Lord, <WH3068> take no <WH408> rest <WH1824> for yourselves;
And give <WH5414> Him no <WH408> rest <WH1824> until <WH5704> He establishes <WH3559> And makes <WH7760> Jerusalem <WH3389> a praise <WH8416> in the earth. <WH776>

The Lord <WH3068> has sworn <WH7650> by His right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> and by His strong <WH5797> arm, <WH2220> "I will never <WH518> again <WH5750> give <WH5414> your grain <WH1715> [as] food <WH3978> for your enemies; <WH340> Nor <WH518> will foreigners <WH1121> <WH5236> drink <WH8354> your new <WH8492> wine, <WH8492> for which <WH834> you have labored. <WH3021>"
But those who garner <WH622> it will eat <WH398> it, and praise <WH1984> the Lord; <WH3068> And those who gather <WH6908> it will drink <WH8354> it in the courts <WH2691> of My sanctuary. <WH6944>

Go <WH5674> through, <WH5674> go <WH5674> through <WH5674> the gates; <WH8179> Clear <WH6437> the way <WH1870> for the people; <WH5971> Build <WH5549> up, build <WH5549> up the highway; <WH4546> Remove <WH5619> the stones, <WH68> lift <WH7311> up a standard <WH5251> over <WH5921> the peoples. <WH5971>

Behold, <WH2009> the Lord <WH3068> has proclaimed <WH8085> to the end <WH7097> of the earth, <WH776> Say <WH559> to the daughter <WH1323> of Zion, <WH6726> "Lo, <WH2009> your salvation <WH3468> comes; <WH935> Behold <WH2009> His reward <WH7939> is with Him, and His recompense <WH6468> before <WH6440> Him."

And they will call <WH7121> them, "The holy <WH6944> people, <WH5971> The redeemed <WH1350> of the Lord <WH3068>"; And you will be called, <WH7121> "Sought <WH1875> out, a city <WH5892> not forsaken. <WH5800>"
